options.content:
üè† Smart Home IoT System

Selected PI: ${pi_id}

Bucket: ${bucket}
Refresh: 5s
Time: ${__now}

‚úÖ Kompletan dashboard za odbranu projekta

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_button")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_motion")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_membrane")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_distance")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_light")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_buzzer")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_distance")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "display_4sd")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kitchen_dht_temperature")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kitchen_dht_humidity")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "gyroscope")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_button")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_distance")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "door_motion")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kitchen_button")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bedroom_dht_temperature")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bedroom_dht_humidity")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "master_dht_temperature")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "master_dht_humidity")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "rgb_led")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "lcd_message")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "living_room_motion")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["pi_id"] == "PI3")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "bedroom_ir")
  |> last()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] =~ /alarm_(state|event)/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 100)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "people_count")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "people")
